    name="logs-my_app-settings",
    template={
        "settings": {
            "index.default_pipeline": "logs-my_app-default",
            "index.lifecycle.name": "logs"
        }
    },
)
print(resp)

    name="logs-my_app-template",
    index_patterns=[
        "logs-my_app-*"
    ],
    data_stream={},
    priority=500,
